slide2.text1: Track every TV show & movie you watch with

slide3.title: What is Trakt.tv?
slide3.text: is a platform that does many things, but primarily keeps track of TV shows and movies you watch. It integrates with media centers (like Kodi) to enable scrobbling, so everything is automatic. Discover new shows and movies, follow people with similar tastes and voice your opinion by using the Trakt.tv website

slide4.title: What is Kodi?
slide4.text1.1: Kodi is a free and open source media center for playing videos, music, pictures, games, and more. Kodi runs on  Linux, OS X, Windows, iOS, and Android.
slide4.text1.2: Learn more and install from Kodi’s website.

slide5.text: Be aware of the next episodes to watch

slide-addon.text2: Go to Settings > Add-ons to manage your add-ons

home.upToDate: Nothing to watch, you're up to date :)

login.message: Sign in or Sign up with Trakt to view your Movies/TV Shows

movie.not-on-tracking-platform: This movie is not present on your tracking platform

notification.notificationNotGranted: Notifications for wako are currently disabled. If you'd like to receive notifications please enable them in the Settings app
notification.itemOnlyNewEpisodeOnUpToDateShows: Be only notified for new aired episodes if I am up to date

trakt.signIn: Connect wako to your Trakt account
trakt.markAsWatchedAutoProgress: Percentage to watch to mark the video as watched

simkl.signIn: Connect wako to your SIMKL account

tracker.not-recommended-warning: Please note that using Trakt + SIMKL on the same category is not recommended and may cause bugs.

kodi-detection.title: Kodi detection
kodi-detection.cardContent:
Kodi hosts are now being searched on your network.
Select one from the list to add it or press the "SKIP" button to add it manually.
kodi-detection.detectHostHelper:
Not host found yet (could take some seconds). Don't forget to start Kodi
The Automatic detection works by using Zeroconf. If it’s not detecting your Kodi, then try enabling Zeroconf in Kodi by going to Settings > Services > General and enable "Announce services to other systems"
kodi-detection.troubleShooting: If you have any issue connecting wako to kodi, please read the documentation here

kodi-remote-list.title: Kodi Hosts
kodi-remote-list.noHostsAdded: No hosts have been added yet
kodi-remote-list.linkVolumeHardware: Link hardware volume buttons to kodi's volume when playing

addons.title: Add-ons
addons.need-contribute: Your trial period has ended, please contribute to use this feature

list-unknown-sources.alert: Third party add-ons will be given access to your data stored on wako. By allowing, you agree that you solely responsible for any loss of data and unwanted behaviour to your app. Please be aware that third party add-ons are neither developed nor endorsed by wako and that wako cannot be held responsible about what these add-ons do.

addon.title: Add-on {{addonName}}
addon.thirdParty: This add-on has not been created by wako. Using third party add-ons will always be subject to your responsibility and the governing law of the jurisdiction you are located. wako cannot be held responsible

movie-discover.title: Discover Movies
movie-discover.searching: Ongoing research, it may take some time

filer.title: File Explorer
filer.noCompatibleAddon: You have no compatible Add-on installed yet

video-type.preferTranscodedFilesChromecast: Prefer transcoded files for Chromecast only
video-type.explainTranscoded: Some service create transcoded files of your videos in a format that is compatible with almost every player including Chromecast that supports only few video format. It's better to enable it for Chromecast. Be aware that transcoded files may won't include other subtitles/audio tracks that original files could include

app-contribution.title: Contribution
app-contribution.premium-user: Congratulations, you are a Premium user.
app-contribution.explain1:
If you really enjoy wako, you can become a Premium user by choosing a product bellow. This will remove ads.
All devices logged to the same user will be affected
app-contribution.explainUsername:
Your wako ID is generated based on your Trakt or SIMKL ID. Your contribution is linked to your wako ID.
If you want to switch from Trakt to SIMKL or vice versa, remember to stay connected to the service (Trakt or SIMKL) you were connected to when you made your contribution to remain a Premium user.
app-contribution.explainTierText2: There are different Tier products, they all have the same effect, only the price changes, it lets you choose what you think wako worth
app-contribution.trialExpired: Your trial period has expired. To continue using the app, please choose a product below
app-contribution.iosTextSubscriptionMonthlyByProduct: A {{ productPrice }}/month purchase will be applied to your iTunes account on confirmation.
app-contribution.iosTextSubscriptionYearlyByProduct: A {{ productPrice }}/year purchase will be applied to your iTunes account on confirmation.
app-contribution.iosTextSubscriptionGeneral: Subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel anytime with your iTunes account settings. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription. For more information, see our Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy.
app-contribution.ads12hRemoval: Get rid of full screen ads for the next 12h by watching 2 rewards ads
app-contribution.ads6hRemoval: Get rid of full screen ads for the next 6h by watching 1 reward ads

app-outdated.text: Your app is outdated, you have to update it to continue

kodi-remote-control.title: Kodi Remote Control
kodi-remote-control.noHost.message: No hosts have been added yet.

install-addons.title: You don't have any add-ons installed

signIn.explain: You can browse information without connecting wako to your Trakt/SIMKL account, however you will need to connect wako to your Trakt/SIMKL account to sync and update your watch history, watch list, etc. Using your Trakt/SIMKL account means that all your history is available on all your devices with Trakt/SIMKL access, including available on Trakt.tv/SIMKL.com on the web.

sign-in.trakt-button: Connect wako to your Trakt account
sign-in.simkl-button: Connect wako to your SIMKL account

install-addons.text1: Do you know you can install add-ons inside wako?
install-addons.text2: By installing add-ons you will add new feature to wako that fit your needs

contribution.remove-ads: Contribute to wako to remove all ads
contribution.trial-expires-soon: Your trial period will expire in {{days}} day(s), you won't be able to use this feature anymore unless you contribute

shared.onlyPremium: This feature is only available for Premium users

movie.removedFromWatchlist: Removed {{movieTitle}} from your Watch List on {{trackers}}

show.addedToWatchlist: Added {{showTitle}} to your Watch List on {{trackers}}
show.removedFromWatchlist: Removed {{showTitle}} from your Watch List on {{trackers}}

kodi-remote-control.warningWebsocket:
Warning - you are not connected to kodi through websocket service. You need to activate in Kodi this option:
Allow remote control from applications on others systems

Go to https://wako.app/kodi-remote-control for more information
